title: 14: S6E14 – "Closer to the Grave" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from authors Kevin David Anderson, Byron Dunbar, Dan Weatherer, and Wentz Hesselman, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about cryptic confessions, bedtime terrors, eerie illnesses, and unbelievable effigies.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
